product_description: Bepure 3G Hot and Normal Water Purifier has 6 Stage ultra purification process. 1. Pre Filter: It takes care of sediments and turbidity from entering the next stages of purifier thus increasing the life of water purifier filters 2. Sediment Filter :It is effective in removing smaller particles including dirt, rust and sand particles. 3. Activated Carbon Filter :It takes out 99% of the chlorine and organic chemicals. It provides reduction of odor, and color and refines the taste of water. 4. Ultra-Filtration Membrane: The hollow fibre UF membrane removes the colloidal particles as well as bacteria and virus from the water 5. Post Carbon Taste Enhancer: The Post carbon taste enhance removes any residual chlorine, smell or taste and the silver impregnated carbon enhance the quality of water. 6. Ultra-Violet Disinfection: The in tank UV lamp sterilize the residual bacteria and virus if any thus disinfecting the water for optimum consumption.

product_important_information: Based on permeate recovery rate. ^ Assumptions: 5 member family with a daily consumption of 2L/ person. Glass quantity of 200 ml. Permeate recovery rate of 30% for other ROs. ~ Copper Charge Technology is a unique proprietary technology, which is based on electrochemical dissolution of copper in water. #Smart Technology which ensures precise dosing in every glass of water. Consumption of 2 litres of copper charged RO water every day will meet up approximately 30% of the RDA for copper (for adults, as guided by the Indian Council of Medical Research, ICMR). **Advance Alert System will alert you 15 days before end of every 180 days (approximately) or 15 hours before completion of every 200 hours of pump running time, whichever is earlier. The purifier will communicate the alert only if the purifier is in a switched on condition during the scheduled alert time. Post the completion of the scheduled alert time, Auto Shut off™ of water will be activated automatically only for GKK, even if the purifier is in a switched off condition. ^Applicable for all water contact parts. 2 Permeate flow rate and recovery are based on standard test conditions and may vary depending on input water quality, TDS, pressure and life of Filter elements. ***Input water quality and TDS content are important determinants of output water quality. **** If input pressure exceeds 30 PSI, please install a company provided pressure reducing valve at an additional cost. If the pressure is lesser than 10 PSI then you need to buy ‘Pressure enhancing pump’ at an additional cost. Device should not be installed in a house where input pressure is greater than 60 psi. > In case the TDS is >1000 PPM, a company provided anti-scalant is recommended to be installed. This has to be purchased at extra cost. >> If the iron content in the input water is more, it is recommended to install a company provided iron filter at an additional cost. $ 7.6 to 8 litres under running water. ^! product_description: Ensure your family’s good health with an advanced KENT Supreme Alkaline RO+UV+UF+TDS Control+Alkaline Water Purifier. The extra features in the KENT Supreme Alkaline make it a truly a top-of-the-line product. The alkaline feature enhances the pH level of the purified water up to 9.5. that helps to reduce acidity, regulates your body’s pH levels, boosts your immunity, and fortifies your health. Designed as wall mountable, this purifier with Mineral RO Technology retains essential minerals in the purified water and saves every single drop of rejected water during purification process through Zero Water Wastage Technology. Best suited for Indian homes and offices, it is ideal for purification of brackish/tap water/municipal corporation water supply.

product_description: Aquatec plus is one of the leading supplier of water purifiers to the customers. We supply all kinds of water purifiers which are domestic and commercial water purifiers. We have been able to achieve 100% customer satisfaction through our professional and on time service. You can visit our web site , www.aquatecplus.in These water purifiers provide the best services to the clients, as they are completely tested on all quality parameters. Our mission is to help the clients in getting the services which matches their requirement and provide safe drinking water to the customers. We cannot survive without drinking water and yes, this very life source can be the reason for several problems and diseases, if we do not take adequate precautions before consuming it. Hence, investing in the right water purifier is absolutely essential. Aquatec plus RO+UV+UF +TDS Water Purifier offers amazing features, great functionality and impeccable service to ensure that you and your family always have safe drinking water. Feature rich, this water purifier uses reverse osmosis and UV processes. It comes with a built-in TDS balancer, on-off automatic operation.. This filter is wall mounted and is best suited for Indian homes and is suitable to purify tap/municipal water. This Aquatec plus water filter will take care of your drinking water needs in the most hassle free manner. You could own this filter by buying this online on amazon.
